comments.body:
You're going to need to manually package the license file:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/adding_pkgs.html#packaging-the-license-manually

also, please add a comment in the line above `license_file` including the link to the pull request below. This will be a reminder to check to see if the license file is in the source distribution of future releases of the package so the manually added copy can be removed. 

https://github.com/sbi-rviot/ph_table/pull/5

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@  # check to see if PR: https://github.com/sbi-rviot/ph_table/pull/5 has been merged
  # so we can drop the local license in recipe
  license_file: "LICENSE.txt"
  summary: "Make pandas dataframe looking pretty again"
  doc_url: ""

comments.body:
Sorry I missed this in the initial review. I think this can be `noarch: python`:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/knowledge_base.html#noarch-python
